last_episode_to_air.name: I See Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mike and Molly gather with family and friends for a momentous occasion and reminisce about everything that led to this point.

name: Mike & Molly
overview: A comedy about a working class Chicago couple who find love at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
The first season of the television comedy series Mike & Molly aired between September 20, 2010 and May 16, 2011, on CBS in the United States. The season was produced by Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television, with series creator Mark Roberts serving as executive producer along with Chuck Lorre, James Burrows and Don Foster.

The series focuses on the title characters Mike Biggs and Molly Flynn, a couple who meet at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting in Chicago, Illinois. After Molly, a primary-school teacher, invites police officer Mike to give a talk to her class, they begin dating. Molly lives at home with her mother Joyce, and sister Victoria. Joyce is in an on-off relationship with widower Vince Moranto, who is often seen at the house. Mike lives alone in an apartment but is regularly kept company by his best friend and partner in the police force Carl McMillan. Other prominent characters in the series include Carl's grandmother Rosetta; Mike's mother Peggy and cafe worker Samuel. Season one of Mike & Molly consisted of 24 episodes and aired Mondays in the United States at 9.30 p.m. until April 11, 2011, with the final three episodes airing at 9.00 p.m.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:
The second season of the television comedy series Mike & Molly began airing on September 26, 2011 on CBS in the United States. The season is produced by Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television, with series creator Mark Roberts serving as executive producer along with Chuck Lorre, James Burrows and Don Foster.

The series focuses on the title characters Mike Biggs and Molly Flynn, a couple who meet at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting in Chicago, Illinois. After Molly, a primary-school teacher, invites police officer Mike to give a talk to her class, they begin dating. Molly lives at home with her mother Joyce, and sister Victoria. Joyce is in an on-off relationship with widower Vince Moranto, who is often seen at the house. Mike lives alone in an apartment but is regularly kept company by his best friend and partner in the police force Carl McMillan. Other prominent characters in the series include Carl's grandmother Rosetta; Mike's mother Peggy and cafe worker Samuel. Holly Robinson Peete has a recurring guest role in Season 2 as Carl's love interest. Season two of Mike & Molly broadcasts on Mondays in the United States at 9:30 P.M.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When teacher Molly Flynn hears Officer Mike Biggs' "share" at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting, she's instantly smitten and invites him to come speak to her fourth grade class.

episodes.name: First Date
episodes.overview: When Molly gets a cold before her first date with Mike, she takes cold medicine to feel better.

episodes.name: First Kiss
episodes.overview: Mike's ego takes a hit during a bowling date with Molly.

episodes.name: Mike's Not Ready
episodes.overview: Mike turns Molly down when she invites him in after a date.

episodes.name: Carl Is Jealous
episodes.overview: Mike invites Carl on a double date when he becomes jealous of the time Mike is spending with Molly.

episodes.name: Mike's Apartment
episodes.overview: Mikes invites Molly over to his apartment, but a call from his mother interrupts his plans for romance.

episodes.name: After the Lovin'
episodes.overview: After spending the weekend with Molly, Mike tries to follow Carl's advice to play it cool.

episodes.name: Mike Snores
episodes.overview: Mike gets a taste of living with Molly's mom and sister after Molly insists he spend the night at her place.

episodes.name: Mike's New Boots
episodes.overview: Molly becomes jealous when Mike introduces her as his "friend" to a woman who is clearly flirting with him.

episodes.name: Molly Gets A Hat
episodes.overview: When Mike's overbearing mother buys Molly a new hat as a gesture of goodwill, Molly feels obliged to invite her to spend Thanksgiving with her family.

episodes.name: Carl Gets A Girl
episodes.overview: Mike allows Carl to bring a date to his apartment, so he decides to spend some time at Molly's house where he actually manages to bond with Molly's mother and sister.

episodes.name: First Christmas
episodes.overview: Mike tries to find a perfect gift for his very first Christmas with Molly.

episodes.name: Mike Goes to the Opera
episodes.overview: Mike's mom and Molly argue about who can take better care of him when he gets ill.

episodes.name: Molly Makes Soup
episodes.overview: Molly isn't happy when Joyce's boyfriend Vince tries to become friends with Mike by inviting him to a basketball game.

episodes.name: Jim Won't Eat
episodes.overview: When Mike's mom, Peggy, needs gallbladder surgery, she shocks Molly by asking her to take care of her dog. Meanwhile, Molly is thrown when Mike starts talking about being buried next to her when he dies.

episodes.name: First Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Mike's big plans for his first Valentine's Day with Molly are thrown into jeopardy after he accidentally runs into Molly's ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: Joyce & Vince and Peaches & Herb
episodes.overview: When Mike refuses to leave his comfortable couch, Molly decides to go out with her sister.

episodes.name: Mike's Feet
episodes.overview: When they spend way too much time working together during a snowstorm, Mike and Carl begin getting on each other's nerves.

episodes.name: Peggy Shaves Her Legs
episodes.overview: When Peggy and Molly have lunch together, Mike worries that his mom is telling Molly unflattering stories about his childhood.

episodes.name: Opening Day
episodes.overview: Mike breaks tradition and invites Molly to join him and Carl at opening day for the Chicago Cubs.

episodes.name: Samuel Gets Fired
episodes.overview: When Samuel loses his job and apartment, Mike offers to let him stay at his place...with interesting results.

episodes.name: Cigar Talk
episodes.overview: When Joyce invites Vince to attend her high school reunion, Vince confesses to Mike that he never graduated high school, and convinces Mike to help him study for his GED.

episodes.name: Victoria's Birthday
episodes.overview: Victoria panics as her 30th birthday approaches, and drags Mike and Molly into her "life crisis".

episodes.name: Peggy's New Beau
episodes.overview: Mike feels pressured when Peggy's new boyfriend asks whether he and Molly hear wedding bells in their future.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
The first season of the television comedy series Mike & Molly aired between September 20, 2010 and May 16, 2011, on CBS in the United States. The season was produced by Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television, with series creator Mark Roberts serving as executive producer along with Chuck Lorre, James Burrows and Don Foster.

The series focuses on the title characters Mike Biggs and Molly Flynn, a couple who meet at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting in Chicago, Illinois. After Molly, a primary-school teacher, invites police officer Mike to give a talk to her class, they begin dating. Molly lives at home with her mother Joyce, and sister Victoria. Joyce is in an on-off relationship with widower Vince Moranto, who is often seen at the house. Mike lives alone in an apartment but is regularly kept company by his best friend and partner in the police force Carl McMillan. Other prominent characters in the series include Carl's grandmother Rosetta; Mike's mother Peggy and cafe worker Samuel. Season one of Mike & Molly consisted of 24 episodes and aired Mondays in the United States at 9.30 p.m. until April 11, 2011, with the final three episodes airing at 9.00 p.m.

episodes.name: Goin' Fishin'
episodes.overview: Following their engagement, Molly is anxious to start planning the wedding while Mike wants to go fishing with his friends.

episodes.name: Dennis's Birthday
episodes.overview: Peggy gets a big surprise when she celebrates her boyfriend's birthday.

episodes.name: Mike in the House
episodes.overview: Mike tries to adjust after he gives up his bachelor pad and moves in with Molly and her family.

episodes.name: '57 Chevy Bel Air
episodes.overview: Molly wants to save money for their wedding, but Mike is lured into buying Vinceâ€™s 1957 Chevy Bel Air.

episodes.name: Victoria Runs Away
episodes.overview: Despite Mike's good intentions, he adds fuel to the fire when Molly and her family get in a fight.

episodes.name: Happy Halloween
episodes.overview: Mike is spooked when Molly's boss invites them to a party on Halloween, a holiday he dreads.

episodes.name: Carl Meets a Lady
episodes.overview: Carl tries to get a date with an attractive woman (guest star Holly Robinson Peete) he meets at the diner.

episodes.name: Peggy Gets A Job
episodes.overview: When Mike encourages his mom, Peggy, to get a job, he never imagines how it will interfere with Molly's life.

episodes.name: Mike Cheats
episodes.overview: Mike starts cheating on his diet as Thanksgiving Day approaches, but attempts to hide it from Molly.

episodes.name: Molly Needs a Number
episodes.overview: When Molly is swamped with Thanksgiving preparations and wedding planning, she asks Mike to help, with mixed results.

episodes.name: Christmas Break
episodes.overview: After getting disappointing news at work, Molly goes into a bad state which threatens to ruin Christmas.

episodes.name: Carl Has Issues
episodes.overview: Carl faces his fear of commitment when his relationship with Christina takes a serious turn.

episodes.name: Victoria Can't Drive
episodes.overview: Molly and Joyce ask Mike for help when Victoria is arrested for a number of driving violations.

episodes.name: Joyce's Choices
episodes.overview: When Joyce accepts an ex-boyfriend's dinner invitation, Vince goes crazy with jealousy.

episodes.name: Valentine's Piggyback
episodes.overview: After forgetting to prepare for Valentine's Day, Mike takes advantage of Carl's elaborate plans with Christina (Holly Robinson Peete).

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: Molly decides to throw Mike a birthday party to make up for the fact that he hasn't had one since he was 9-years-old; Samuel dates a girl he met online.

episodes.name: Mike Likes Lasagna
episodes.overview: When Molly suggests that she and Mike write their own wedding vows, he finds it hard to swallow, until Carl provides him with some food for thought and tells him to just pretend he's describing his favorite meal - lasagna.

episodes.name: Peggy Goes to Branson
episodes.overview: Peggy goes on vacation and leaves Mike and Molly in charge of her dog, claiming that it's good practice for when they have children.

episodes.name: Molly Can't Lie
episodes.overview: When Mike and Molly meet with the priest at Peggy's church, Molly's forthright nature winds up costing them their wedding chapel.

episodes.name: The Dress
episodes.overview: Molly's dieting goes into overdrive when her wedding dress doesn't zip during her final fitting.

episodes.name: Bachelor/Bachelorette
episodes.overview: Mike's dad comes to town early to attend Mike's bachelor party, which prompts Peggy to attend Molly's bachelorette event.

episodes.name: The Rehearsal
episodes.overview: Two days before their wedding, Mike and Molly arrange their wedding rehearsal which turns into a disaster.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Mike and Molly have to deal with several problems as they make their way to the altar.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview:
The second season of the television comedy series Mike & Molly began airing on September 26, 2011 on CBS in the United States. The season is produced by Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television, with series creator Mark Roberts serving as executive producer along with Chuck Lorre, James Burrows and Don Foster.

The series focuses on the title characters Mike Biggs and Molly Flynn, a couple who meet at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting in Chicago, Illinois. After Molly, a primary-school teacher, invites police officer Mike to give a talk to her class, they begin dating. Molly lives at home with her mother Joyce, and sister Victoria. Joyce is in an on-off relationship with widower Vince Moranto, who is often seen at the house. Mike lives alone in an apartment but is regularly kept company by his best friend and partner in the police force Carl McMillan. Other prominent characters in the series include Carl's grandmother Rosetta; Mike's mother Peggy and cafe worker Samuel. Holly Robinson Peete has a recurring guest role in Season 2 as Carl's love interest. Season two of Mike & Molly broadcasts on Mondays in the United States at 9:30 P.M.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon is Over
episodes.overview: Mike is inspired by their honeymoon trip to Paris to change his life and travel the world, while Molly worries how their family and friends fared at home without them.

episodes.name: Vince Takes A Bath
episodes.overview: Joyce conveniently disappears after a back injury renders Vince practically immobile, and that leaves Mike and Molly to take care of him. Meanwhile, the newlyweds are still laboring over personalized thank-you notes for their wedding presents.

episodes.name: Mike Likes Cake
episodes.overview: Molly gets upset when she reviews her wedding photos because in every picture Mike's mouth is open or his eyes are closed. Meanwhile, Carl gets jealous when Christina's ex-husband comes back into her life.

episodes.name: Molly in the Middle
episodes.overview: Mike and Molly decide the time is right for them to start trying for a baby. Meanwhile, Carl gets upset when he learns that Molly is still spending time with Christina after their breakup.

episodes.name: Mike's Boss
episodes.overview: Mike is forced to set up his mom with his boss, despite his many reservations.

episodes.name: Yard Sale
episodes.overview: With the house feeling too cramped and crowded, Molly plans a family yard sale. Meanwhile, Mike and the guys take Carl on a fishing trip to help him forget his breakup with Christina.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving Is Cancelled
episodes.overview: When Mike gets sick for Thanksgiving, Molly is excited that she doesnâ€™t have to cook â€“ until Vince invites his brother to town for a homemade Thanksgiving meal.

episodes.name: Mike Likes Briefs
episodes.overview: When Mike gets nervous after Molly doesnâ€™t get pregnant following weeks of trying, he turns to Carl and Samuel for advice.

episodes.name: Mike Takes a Test
episodes.overview: With Molly's encouragement, Mike decides to take a shot at becoming a detective, but the stress of readying for the exam begins to impact their relationship.

episodes.name: Karaoke Christmas
episodes.overview: Even while portraying Santa, Mike cannot contain his frustrations over Molly's Christmas spending and warns unsuspecting children about the dangers of maxing out credit cards to buy toys. Later, while Molly's family enjoys holiday festivities at home - complete with Christmas carols on Victoria's new karaoke machine - Mike and Molly get roped into spending Christmas Eve at church with Mike's mother and boss.

episodes.name: Fish for Breakfast
episodes.overview: In an effort to boost their chances of getting pregnant, Molly encourages Mike to join her in giving up caffeine and eating healthier, causing them both to have major withdrawals.

episodes.name: Mollyâ€™s Birthday
episodes.overview: Mike prepares to spoil Molly for her birthday, but his plans go awry after he eats psychedelic gelato made by Victoriaâ€™s friend Tom.

episodes.name: Carl Gets a Roommate
episodes.overview: Mike puts his construction skills to use turning the basement into a living suite for him and Molly, but he may have gotten in over his head. Meanwhile, Carl asks Samuel if he would be interested in moving in with him.

episodes.name: The Princess and the Troll
episodes.overview: On Valentine's Day, Mike and Molly play Cupid and prod Harry into asking Victoria out on a date, and to everyone's surprise she accepts. Meanwhile, Carl has a list of reasons why hanging out at the coin laundry on the holiday will help Samuel and him meet single women.

episodes.name: Mike the Tease
episodes.overview: Wannabe-parent Mike takes a crash course in male fertility and heads to a clinic to ensure that he's potent enough to make a mother out of Molly. Meanwhile, Vince starts a job as a door-to-door vacuum-cleaner salesman.

episodes.name: Molly's New Shoes
episodes.overview: After their verbal brawl at the mall, Mike goes off in a huff, so Molly goes off on a shopping spree.

episodes.name: St. Patrick's Day
episodes.overview: Carl and Samuel hope for a little luck o' the Irish when it comes to picking up women at their St. Patrick's Day party, while Molly does a little Erin go bragging when she tells Mike about some of her holiday shenanigans.

episodes.name: Spring Break
episodes.overview: Molly joins Victoria and her junior-college friends on a spring-fling getaway, while Mike works the Captain for some overtime assignments to earn some extra cash.

episodes.name: Party Planners
episodes.overview: Mikeâ€™s birthday wish is to have his wife and mother get along, but Molly and Peggy butt heads more than ever as they try to plan his birthday party together. Meanwhile, Samuel and Carl compete for the same woman.

episodes.name: Mike Can't Read
episodes.overview: After learning that Joyce gave up her artistic talents when she became a mother, Molly decides that she and Mike need to pursue new hobbies before becoming parents, so they take up roller skating.

episodes.name: Mollyâ€™s Out of Town
episodes.overview: Mike goes on a junk food binge to cope with missing Molly while she is out of town for a teacherâ€™s conference. Meanwhile, Carl contemplates leaving Chicago after learning heartbreaking news from James.

episodes.name: School Recital
episodes.overview: Molly is so focused on directing a school recital that she doesnâ€™t realize a fellow teacher is hitting on her. Meanwhile, Vince convinces Mike to join him in an unusual money-making scheme.

episodes.name: Windy City
episodes.overview: Mike and Carl get stuck working at the Renaissance Faire after their boss, Patrick, gets dumped by Mikeâ€™s mother. Later, as a tornado descends on Chicago, Mike and Molly each confess important news to each other.

episodes.name: Molly Unleashed
episodes.overview: When Molly finds herself at a crossroads with her career, she makes a huge decision.

episodes.name: The First and Last Ride-Along
episodes.overview: When Molly decides to start a career as a crime novelist, she goes on a ride-along with Mike to research her first book.

episodes.name: Sex and Death
episodes.overview: Molly has a â€œmind-blowingâ€ experience when she goes to Victoriaâ€™s workplace, a funeral home, to research her novel.  Meanwhile, Mike sneaks a peek at Mollyâ€™s writing when sheâ€™s out.

episodes.name: Careful What You Dig For
episodes.overview: Budding author Molly meets her literary idol, whose cynical advice is to focus on what she wouldn't want people to know about, while Mike tries to cheer up his down-in-the-dumps mother by having her over for dinner.

episodes.name: Poker in the Front, Looker in the Back
episodes.overview: Molly believes her suspicious next-door neighbor is up to no good and recruits Joyce to help her spy on him.  Meanwhile, the guys get together for a poker game and end up sharing their dreams and aspirations.

episodes.name: Shoeless Molly Flynn
episodes.overview: Molly needs to adjust her spending habits on shoes if she wants to maintain harmony in her marriage.

episodes.name: They Shoot Asses, Don't They?
episodes.overview: Mike decides he needs to live everyday like itâ€™s his last after being shot during a robbery.  As a result, he tells Carl itâ€™s time for him to quit the police force.

episodes.name: What Molly Hath Wrought
episodes.overview: Molly accepts a job as a forklift driver at Vince's warehouse when she decides to take a break from writing her novel.

episodes.name: Mike & Molly's Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Determined to change Mike's normal routine, Molly encourages him to try new things.

episodes.name: Weekend at Peggy's
episodes.overview: After fighting with Joyce about money, Molly and Mike move into Mike's childhood bedroom at Peggy's place.

episodes.name: Dips & Salsa
episodes.overview: Mike asks Carl to fill in for him as Molly's dance partner, but gets jealous when he thinks they are having too much fun.

episodes.name: Mind Over Molly
episodes.overview: At Mike's urging, Molly begrudgingly goes to a therapist (John Michael Higgins).

episodes.name: Open Mike Night
episodes.overview: Samuel wants to be a standup comic; Molly offers advice to Harry which leads to him challenging his protective mother.

episodes.name: Rich Man, Poor Girl
episodes.overview: The entire family wonders if Victoria has finally met the one when she brings a new boyfriend home.

episodes.name: Three Girls and an Urn
episodes.overview: Molly meets the friend of her dreams when Peggy's childhood pal (Kathy Bates) visits, but Peggy isn't fond of sharing.

episodes.name: The Dice Lady Cometh
episodes.overview: Molly tries to win some extra cash during a trip to a riverboat casino with the girls; Vince and Mike watch college basketball with the guys.

episodes.name: McMillan and Mom
episodes.overview: Mike, Samuel and Carl go on a road trip to Memphis, Tenn., to meet Carl's mother.

episodes.name: Mike's Manifold Destiny
episodes.overview: When Mike's car breaks down, he must decide if he should accept a loan from Carl to fix it.

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of J.C. Small?
episodes.overview: Carl and Mike arrest Molly's literary hero (Susan Sarandon) for a DUI.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies and Helicopters
episodes.overview: Molly wonders if she should tell Mike when she sees Carl coming out of Victoria's room late at night.

episodes.name: This Old Peggy
episodes.overview: After Peggy's bathtub falls through the ceiling, Mike wants Peggy to go to a doctor.

episodes.name: Eight Is Enough
episodes.overview: Molly is ecstatic to be accepted into a prestigious eight-week writer's workshop, but Mike isn't thrilled about having his wife gone for the entire summer.

episodes.name: The Book of Molly
episodes.overview: Mike smiles with joy after seeing Molly's advance check after she returned home from an eight week writing shop telling him she's been published.

episodes.name: To Have and Withhold
episodes.overview: Molly has writerâ€™s block, and she might lose her big advance if she doesnâ€™t cure it fast

episodes.name: 'Tis the Season to Be Molly
episodes.overview: Mike promises Molly he will be home in time for dinner on Christmas Eve--until he and Carl find themselves in the back of a stolen truck; Molly is upset with Vince for trying to alter Christmas traditions.

episodes.name: Gone Cheatin'
episodes.overview: Mike thinks Carl is out of line when he invites Victoria to go on what is supposed to be a men-only fishing trip.

episodes.name: Molly's Neverending Story
episodes.overview: When Molly starts writing multiple drafts of her book, she starts to irritate Mike and the rest of the family.

episodes.name: The Last Temptation of Mike
episodes.overview: Guilt sets in for Mike when he flirts with a rookie cop and she reciprocates.

episodes.name: Support Your Local Samuel
episodes.overview: Samuel contemplates moving back to Africa when he receives a letter from his parents saying theyâ€™re struggling financially.

episodes.name: Mike Check
episodes.overview: Molly urges Mike to go to the doctor when she learns he hasnâ€™t been in over a decade, on the 100th episode.

episodes.name: Hack to the Future
episodes.overview: Molly faces a dilemma when her publisher asks her to make a provocative change to her book.

episodes.name: Checkpoint Joyce
episodes.overview: Mike is forced to arrest Joyce for a DUI after she refuses to take a breathalyzer at a checkpoint.

episodes.name: Immaculate Deception
episodes.overview: Mike and Molly are excited to finally have the house to themselves for the whole weekend.

episodes.name: The World According to Peggy
episodes.overview: Molly plans a party after hearing that Peggy is suddenly retiring.

episodes.name: Buy The Book
episodes.overview: Mollyâ€™s excited her book is finally out and available for purchase, but worries obsessively that no one will buy it.

episodes.name: Whatever Happened to Baby Peggy
episodes.overview: Peggy makes Molly do chores in exchange for sharing tantalizing stories from her past for Mollyâ€™s second book.

episodes.name: Pie Fight
episodes.overview: When Mike reaches a weight-loss goal -- his personal best -- he decides to celebrate by indulging in a slice of pie.

episodes.name: Cocktails and Calamine
episodes.overview: Molly is nervous about Mike attending a celebratory party her publisher puts on for her and Peggy.

episodes.name: Mudlick or Bust
episodes.overview: Molly surprises Peggy by reuniting her with her estranged sister, Rosemary, when they take a road trip to Peggyâ€™s hometown of Mudlick. Also, Vince and Mike experience father-son bonding when they work together to fix the water heater.

episodes.name: No Kay Morale
episodes.overview: When a despondent Kay returns to town, Peggy is thrilled to welcome her back to coexist in her mundane existence. However, Molly is determined to find a way to restore Kayâ€™s joie de vivre. Also, Mike and Carl work crowd control at a rally for public breast feeding

episodes.name: Mother From Another Mudlick
episodes.overview: Mike meets his Aunt Rosemary for the first time and is instantly smitten by her warmth and positive attitude â€“ which is the polar opposite of his mother

episodes.name: Fight To The Finish
episodes.overview: Molly gets angry at Mike for not listening to her vent about writing with Peggy and they go their separate ways for a day.

episodes.name: Near Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: After Carl has a near-death experience while on duty, he tells Mike heâ€™s going to propose to Victoria.

episodes.name: The Bitter Man and the Sea
episodes.overview: Mike is forced to uninvited Carl to his anniversary cruise after Carlâ€™s nasty break-up with Victoria.

episodes.name: Cops on the Rocks
episodes.overview: Mike and Carl go to couples counseling to try to reconcile their partnership.  Also, Molly decides to do a promotional radio interview on her own after Peggy decides not to participate.

episodes.name: One Small Step for Mike
episodes.overview: Molly gives Mike a device that will track his activity in hopes of helping him get healthier and take better care of himself, but Mike has other plans.

episodes.name: Peg O' My Heart Attack
episodes.overview: Mike blames Molly for Peg's heart attack following a heated argument and now Molly wants to make amends.

episodes.name: Super Cop
episodes.overview: Mike becomes hypervigilant after his wallet is stolen from the squad car while taking a nap.

episodes.name: Joyce's Will Be Done
episodes.overview: Molly is shocked when Joyce reveals she's leaving the house to Victoria in her will.

episodes.name: The Good Wife
episodes.overview: Molly's leisure activities between novels become an issue when Mike wants her to be the perfect homemaker.

episodes.name: Weekend With Birdie
episodes.overview: Mike brings home a stray puppy for the weekend but Molly has difficulty warming up to it.

episodes.name: The Wreck of the Vincent Moranto
episodes.overview: Mike is upset when Vince bails on finishing a Do-It-Yourself project they started together.

episodes.name: Baby, Please Don't Go
episodes.overview: Molly brings home a pregnant former student she discovers is homeless.

episodes.name: Baby Bump
episodes.overview: When Mike and Molly realize Frannie (Juliette Goglia) doesn't have a plan in place for after the baby is born,  Molly decides to help by reuniting her with her estranged sister, Maura (Jessy Hodges).

episodes.name: The Adoption Option
episodes.overview: Mike and Molly need everyone to be on their best behavior when the adoption agency schedules a home visit.

episodes.name: Curse of the Bambino
episodes.overview: Carl convinces Mike to go with him to see his psychic and Peggy drags Molly to her church to pray for something theyâ€™ve all been waiting for,

episodes.name: I See Love
episodes.overview: Mike and Molly gather with family and friends for a momentous occasion and reminisce about everything that led to this point.
